document.full_text: euro zone finance ministers said for the first time on monday that they would consider asking greece's private creditors to extend the maturities on their bonds to buy athens more time to pay down its huge debt.
document.title: euro zone eyes greek debt move, backs portugal aid
lines_and_colors: euro zone finance ministers said for the first time on monday that they would consider asking greece's private creditors to extend the maturities on their bonds to buy athens more time to pay down its huge debt.
